> [!IMPORTANT]
> All Pull Requests MUST have a release branch set as the base branch, as per the [guidance](https://github.com/iconicwp/iconic-engineering/blob/main/documentation/release-guidance.md#release-branches--prs).

### Pre-Merge Checklist
> Review and action these items before merge. Check any items that are N/A.

- [ ] Is a release branch being used as the base branch?
- [ ] Has the PR title got the correct prefix?
- [ ] Is an issue number or support ticket referenced?
- [ ] Does the change work with + without the block editor?
- [ ] Have testing steps been added to the PR?
- [ ] Are videos/images added to demonstrate?
- [ ] Is guidance provided for documentation?
- [ ] Has QA feedback been resolved?

### Details
> Ensure PR title is in the format `[fix/update/new] - Summary of Issue` and the issue number is added to the `Fixes` declaration.

Fixes: #[Issue Number]

**Description:**
> A brief description of what the PR fixes.

...

**Test Steps:**
> A step by step guide so that the functionality can be tested.

1. ...

**Video / Images:**
> A supporting video demonstrating the changes (using a tool such as Loom) or images (be sure to include before and after shots if it relates to a visual change).

...

**Documentation**
> Provide guidance relating to the changes in this PR that can be used to update the documentation on the website.

...
